posts.body: Why is a zeroid cert needed? What's wrong with a generated one?
The Fringebay URLs might stop working any moment. Hopefully there will be a static archive of the whole thing posted somewhere before that happens.

I have never gotten this address to load.
On unrelated news, if you can't post, you need to get a zeroid certificate and use that on this site. Pretty retarded if you ask me.

>>73d7cdf3-b659-496b-8c80-d11df9127212
>TL;DR we need anonymity that doesn't depend on Tor
Build relationships and associate in real life with the people closest to you and implement it in the real world. Bonus side effect: whatever you come up with as a group will have an actual chance of changing something by applying it locally, instead of getting diluted as a late night post in-between bouts of soul-crushing and dehumanizing routine for some people you will never meet to see and do nothing about.
